name: Chort Devil
damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered
languages: Celestial, Common, Draconic, Infernal, Primordial; telepathy (120 ft.)

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The chort devil makes three melee attacks with its flaming ranseur, or three melee attacks with its claws.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d4 + 7) slashing damage plus 2 (1d4) Charisma damage.

actions.name: Flaming Ranseur
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (1d10 + 7) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Devilish Weapons
actions.desc: Any weapons wielded by a chort devil do 10 (3d6) fire damage in addition to their normal weapon damage.

special_abilities.name: Devil's Sight
special_abilities.desc: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's darkvision.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
the chort devil's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). The chort devil can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

at will: blur, magic circle, teleportation

3/day: scorching ray (5 rays)

1/day each: dispel magic, dominate person, flame strike, haste
